div.head: For making bronze in gold color
div.ab: Take one ounce of sal ammoniac and grind it in an iron mortar. Once well ground, take one ounce of sulfur, and

grind it separately. When it is well-ground, take the sal ammoniac & grind it together again. Then take one ounce of soft tin & one ounce of quicksilver, then melt your tin & put your quicksilver drop by drop into your tin while melting, & stir strongly until it is powder.
